text: this unverified video apparently shows
the moment a group of people run into a
gunman on the streets of Munich around
the shopping center there was panic as
people tried to find their way to safety
[Applause]
many armed police officers including
Special Forces were soon on the scene
but from the roof of the car park
a gunman carries on firing the emergency
services poured into the area telling
people to get off the streets and go
home the Metro has been closed down it's
like firemen and police but all this

now it's no cars just just on side of

everybody are running around the police
